name: ladda-cache
description: Data fetching layer with support for caching

scripts.test: env NODE_PATH=$NODE_PATH:$PWD/src ./node_modules/.bin/mocha --compilers js:babel-register --reporter spec src/*.spec.js 'src/**/*.spec.js' --require mocha.config
scripts.coverage: env NODE_PATH=$NODE_PATH:$PWD/src nyc -x '**/*.spec.js' -x '**/*.config.js' --reporter=lcov --reporter=text mocha --compilers js:babel-register --reporter spec src/*.spec.js 'src/**/*.spec.js' --require mocha.config

author: Peter Crona <petercrona89@gmail.com> (http://www.icecoldcode.com)
